content:
Hi,

Currently I am using the latest released version of HAPI FHIR (v5.1.0) from docker hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/hapiproject/hapi/tags?page=1&ordering=last_updated

According to https://github.com/hapifhir/hapi-fhir/releases the $lastn Operation was released in version 5.1.0. However, on https://github.com/hapifhir/hapi-fhir-jpaserver-starter the latest release (5.2.0) was made on November 18, while the PR to support $lastn is was merged in december:
https://github.com/hapifhir/hapi-fhir-jpaserver-starter/pull/187

So it looks like for the jpaserver-starter (which IIRC is the base for the docker hub release images?) the $lastn Operation is not yet released.

Is my understanding correct? If so, are there plans to release a new version of the jpaserver-starter/docker hub image?
